name: Denim Jeans Teddy Bears
description:
Denim jeans are tough. Denim jeans teddy bears are as tough as the recycled jeans that teddy bear is made of. I use name-brand recycled jeans only.

Denim jeans teddy bears are 22 inches tall and generously stuffed with polyester fiberfill made for crafts. Fiberfill is washable and non-allergenic. Teddy Bear's body is made of cotton denim jeans.

Teddy Bear eyes are plastic safety lock. Snout is hand embroidered. Teddy Bear has no breakable parts. Arms and legs are sewn onto teddy bears body.

I am accepting custom orders at this time. Payment for teddy bear must be processed before I purchase materials.

name: 1st Teddy Bear
description:
Imagine the delight in your child's eyes when 1st Teddy Bear appears. 

Your child's 1st teddy bear is 18 inches tall and generously stuffed with polyester fiberfill made for crafts. Fiberfill is washable and non-allergenic. Teddy Bear's body is made of cotton.

Teddy Bear eyes are plastic safety lock. Snout is hand embroidered. 1st teddy bear has no breakable parts. Arms and legs are sewn onto teddy bears body.

I am accepting custom orders at this time. Payment for teddy bear must be processed before I purchase materials.

name: Jointed Teddy Bear
description:
Teddy Bear is 18 inches tall and generously stuffed with polyester fiberfill made for crafts. Fiberfill is washable and non-allergenic. Teddy Bear's body is made of cotton.

Teddy Bear eyes are plastic safety lock. Snout is hand embroidered.

Arms and legs are jointed. Only one jointed bear is in stock. I am accepting custom orders at this time. However, Teddy Bear pictured is for sale.

Please be advised  that jointed teddy bear has plastic joints which if handled roughly could be damaged.  Buyer determines if this teddy bear is age appropriate for recipient.

A bow-tie is included. Neck collar is closed with two small snaps.
